column5: I know its only June, but was curious as to how the flow is now and projections for Oct...tks

Water is really high... They have been moving water for the last month or so. Hope the flow keeps up but I guess it will depend on mother nature. Didn't get a spring bite on the river but Manigotagan 45min north or PIne Falls is on fire. They get a really good greenback run at this time of year. All the fish we caught last fall are in that river system right now. Cranks and spinners are working.
I the big fish caught all winter long in the south basin of lake wpg is an indication of next year. The green backs shoould be hot
Thanks Laurent...will be up around Oct 5th...staying for at least a week...will call.
